text:
**Haunting Memories**

Dimly lit room, tense atmosphere  
Raskolnikov: "Yes... I knew him."  

Ilya: "He shot himself? Shocking."  
Raskolnikov: "He left a note... no one to blame."  

---

Stairs, Raskolnikov staggering, overwhelmed  
Raskolnikov: "Itâ€™s so stuffy here..."  

Raskolnikov: "Excuse my troubling you..."  
Ilya: "Always a pleasure to see you."  

Raskolnikov: "Good-bye."

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov learns about a man who committed suicide, leaving behind a note absolving others of blame, which deeply unsettles him.
